segments.text: I see the woman is really focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even notice the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the puddle getting bigger and bigger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool and it looks dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's going to fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is going to be a mess with all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman doesn't slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky and quiet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman will be surprised when she finally notices the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is both funny and a bit scary.
segments.speaker: PAR
